item.title: Boeing Completes $4.7B Spirit AeroSystems Acquisition, Reabsorbing Key Supplier
item.description: Spirit Defense, which makes aerostructures for aircraft like the B-21, will be run as a "non-integrated" subsidiary of Boeing’s defense unit.

item.title: Alina Habba Quits Job She Never Legally Held
item.description: Nothing has actually changed except the level of drama.

item.title: Justice Department Locked Out Of Comey Evidence It Never Should Have Had
item.description: Just because you don't enter an appearance doesn't mean the court can't enjoin you.

item.title: Stop Outsourcing By Instinct: How Basha Rubin Says Legal Can Turn Vendor Selection Into A Strategic Asset
Law Firms' Worst Enemy Isn’t AI, It’s Clients Using AI to Stop Paying Them
item.description: While Biglaw grapples with integrating AI into the workflow, corporate legal departments are realizing AI can keep more work in-house.
